alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 6:10PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lander, west central Elko and northwestern Eureka Counties through 645 PM PDT... At 610 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southwest of Tuscarora, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Willow Creek Reservoir and North Area Mine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County
